name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Alphonso GRIFFIN, Petitioner

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Alphonso GRIFFIN, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 12th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Alphonso GRIFFIN, Petitioner
